game_description: Meditation made simple & visual. Transport yourself to a tranquil lake in the mountains, to a lush forest in the majestic redwoods, or to lapping waves by a pristine white sand beach. Bring peace, joy, and calm back into your daily life with Breathe VR Now in 5k – ENVIRONMENTS – 100+ lush environments to escape the every day. – MINDFULNESS – 20+ hours of guided meditations in Zen, Loving Compassion, Maternity, Depression, or Sleep. – CALMING MUSIC – 50+ relaxing audio tracks designed to enhance your meditation experience.
review_1: The app currently has 4 Environments that includes a rocky forest, a fantasy forest, one dawn icey scene with lake and fur trees and a beautiful garden. Containing 3 Guided Meditation and 1 foute audio to choose from !
review_2: The different environment are relaxing and it makes so much easier to meditate.
